#sidebar TableListing  
=Table layout_constraint=
==Remarks==
A layout constraint associates a flexible element to a layout group.

==Schema==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Not Null* || *Primary Key* || *Foreign Key* || *Remarks * ||
|| id_layout_constraint || bigint || X || X ||  || This is the primary key of the table. ||
|| sort_order || integer ||  ||  ||  || It corresponds to the order the flexible element will be displayed. ||
|| id_flexible_element || bigint || X ||  || [flexible_element](id_flexible_element) || This is a foreign key to the table flexible_element ||
|| id_layout_group || bigint || X ||  || [layout_group](id_layout_group) || This is a foreign key to the table layout_group. ||
